# modifierFlags

**Instance Property**

The modifier keys that were pressed at the time of the navigation request.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var modifierFlags: UIKeyModifierFlags { get }
```

```swift
@MainActor var modifierFlags: NSEvent.ModifierFlags { get }
```

## Inspecting user actions

- **buttonNumber**: The number of the mouse button that caused the navigation request.
